00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * Header file for the hotplug APIs
00044  *
00045  * <hr>$Revision:  $<hr>
00046  */
00047 
00048 #ifndef __CVMX_APP_HOTPLUG_H__
00049 #define __CVMX_APP_HOTPLUG_H__
00050 
00051 #ifdef    __cplusplus
00052 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00053 extern "C" {
00054 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 #ifdef CVMX_BUILD_FOR_LINUX_KERNEL
00058 #include <asm/octeon/cvmx.h>
00059 #include <asm/octeon/cvmx-bootmem.h>
00060 #include <asm/octeon/cvmx-spinlock.h>
00061 #else
00062 #include "cvmx.h"
00063 #include "cvmx-coremask.h"
00064 #include "cvmx-interrupt.h"
00065 #include "cvmx-bootmem.h"
00066 #include "cvmx-spinlock.h"
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 #define CVMX_APP_HOTPLUG_MAX_APPS 48
00070 #define CVMX_APP_HOTPLUG_MAX_APPNAME_LEN 256
00071 
00072 /**
00073 * hotplug_start          is the entry  point for hot plugged cores.
00074 * cores_added_callback   is callback which in invoked when new cores are added
00075 *                        to the application. This is invoked on all the old core
00076 *                        that existed before the current set of cores were
00077 *                        added.
00078 * cores_removed_callback is callback which in invoked when cores are removed
00079 *                        an application. This is invoked on  all the cores that
00080 *                        exist after the set of cores being requesed are
00081 *                        removed.
00082 * shutdown_done_callback before the application is shutdown this callback is
00083 *                        invoked on all the cores that are part of the app.
00084 * unplug_callback        before the cores are unplugged this callback is invoked
00085 *                        only on the cores that are being unlpuuged.
00086 */
00087 typedef struct cvmx_app_hotplug_callbacks {
00088     void (*hotplug_start) (void *ptr);
00089     void (*cores_added_callback) (cvmx_coremask_t *, void *ptr);
00090     void (*cores_removed_callback) (cvmx_coremask_t *, void *ptr);
00091     void (*shutdown_callback) (void *ptr);
00092     void (*unplug_core_callback) (void *ptr);
00093 } cvmx_app_hotplug_callbacks_t;
00094 
00095 /*
00096  * The size of this struct should be a fixed size of 1024 bytes.
00097  * and is endianness-agnostic, it may seem wasteful but all flags
00098  * occupy a 64-bit field.
00099  *
00100  * <coremask> represents all core currently running the application
00101  * <hotplug_activated_coremask> represents which cores have registered
00102  * to accept hotplug mailbox interrupts
00103  * <hplugged_cores> represents which cores are being added to an application.
00104  * <unplug_cores> represents the core being removed from an application.
00105  * <shutdown_cores> is set to all cores in <coremask> when the application
00106  * is being shut down.
00107  *
00108  * All callback pointers are in the application virtual address space.
00109  *
00110  * <coremask> indicates all rores running the application.
00111  * <hotplug_activated_coremask> indicates which cores have called
00112  * cvmx_app_hotplug_activate() and are thus ready to receive events.
00113  * <hplugged_cores> lists cores being added to an app dynamically.
00114  * <shutdown_cores> lists all application cores when it is being shut down.
00115  * <unplug_cores> lists the cores being removed from an application.
00116  *
00117  * <app_shutdown> indicates if the application will call cvmx_core_shutdown()
00118  * or the call needs to be made on its behalf by the hotplug library.
00119  * <cvmx_app_boot_record_ptr> is a physical address of the primary
00120  * boot record for an application.
00121  */
00122 typedef struct cvmx_app_hotplug_info {
00123     struct cvmx_coremask coremask;
00124     struct cvmx_coremask hotplug_activated_coremask;
00125     struct cvmx_coremask hplugged_cores;
00126     struct cvmx_coremask shutdown_cores;
00127     struct cvmx_coremask unplug_cores;
00128     uint64_t shutdown_callback;
00129     uint64_t unplug_callback;
00130     uint64_t cores_added_callback;
00131     uint64_t cores_removed_callback;
00132     uint64_t data;
00133     uint64_t app_shutdown;
00134     uint64_t shutdown_done;
00135     uint64_t cvmx_app_boot_record_ptr;
00136     char app_name[CVMX_APP_HOTPLUG_MAX_APPNAME_LEN];
00137     uint64_t unused[7];
00138     uint64_t valid_magic;
00139 } cvmx_app_hotplug_info_t;
00140 
00141 struct cvmx_app_hotplug_global {
00142     cvmx_app_hotplug_info_t hotplug_info_array[CVMX_APP_HOTPLUG_MAX_APPS];
00143     struct cvmx_coremask avail_coremask;
00144     cvmx_spinlock_t hotplug_global_lock;
00145     uint64_t app_under_boot;
00146     uint64_t app_under_shutdown;
00147     uint64_t reserved[8];
00148     uint64_t magic_version;
00149 };
00150 typedef struct cvmx_app_hotplug_global cvmx_app_hotplug_global_t;
00151 
00152 #define CVMX_HOTPLUG_MAGIC_VERSION  0xb10ce1abe1000001ULL
00153 #define CVMX_HOTPLUG_MAGIC_VALID    0xf1a90001f1a90001ULL
00154 
00155 int is_core_being_hot_plugged(void);
00156 int is_app_under_boot_or_shutdown(void);
00157 void set_app_under_boot(int val);
00158 void set_app_under_shutdown(int val);
00159 int cvmx_app_hotplug_shutdown_request(const struct cvmx_coremask *, int);
00160 int cvmx_app_hotplug_unplug_cores(int index, const struct cvmx_coremask *pcm,
00161                   int wait);
00162 cvmx_app_hotplug_info_t *cvmx_app_hotplug_get_info(const struct cvmx_coremask *);
00163 int cvmx_app_hotplug_get_index(const struct cvmx_coremask *pcm);
00164 int is_app_hotpluggable(int index);
00165 int cvmx_app_hotplug_call_add_cores_callback(int index);
00166 #ifndef CVMX_BUILD_FOR_LINUX_USER
00167 int cvmx_app_hotplug_register(void (*)(void *), void *);
00168 int cvmx_app_hotplug_register_cb(cvmx_app_hotplug_callbacks_t *, void *, int);
00169 int cvmx_app_hotplug_activate(void);
00170 void cvmx_app_hotplug_core_shutdown(void);
00171 void cvmx_app_hotplug_shutdown_disable(void);
00172 void cvmx_app_hotplug_shutdown_enable(void);
00173 #endif
00174 
00175 #define CVMX_APP_HOTPLUG_INFO_REGION_SIZE  sizeof(cvmx_app_hotplug_global_t)
00176 #define CVMX_APP_HOTPLUG_INFO_REGION_NAME  "cvmx-app-hotplug-block"
00177 
00178 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00179 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00180 }
00181 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00182 #endif
00183 #endif /* __CVMX_APP_HOTPLUG_H__ */
